description: If I'm <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link>, draw me instead. Create 5 random cards in hand, they cost 0 and are <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: If I'm Tossed, draw me instead. Create 5 random cards in hand, they cost 0 and are Fleeting.
flavorText: Captain Finn roared out "Ye earned this, boys! Told ye the Tithe was nothin' but coward feed!" Some cheered, but not all. The waters seemed to still, save for the bubbles around the Rancour's hull.
name: Treasure Trove
